title: Sarah Mae Parker
text: Sarah is passionate about science and her community and strives to make science more understandable and accessible through teaching, creating videos, and developing software to aid in biological research.

title: Sarah Mae Parker
text:
Education
Sarah is a PhD candidate in the Bioinformatics & Computational Biology program at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill under the mentorship of Doug Phanstiel.
She previously graduated from Pepperdine University in 2019 with a BS in Biological Sciences and a minor in Computer Science.
